products.prd_description: Our new collection embraces the season’s shirt dress trend, lending femininity to its fundamental simplicity and making it an essential addition to your closet. This midi dress is a perfect foundation for casual looks and office wear alike. Layer it over slip dresses, turtlenecks or tees and finish your look with a pair of heels or sneakers, depending on your mood.

This beautiful sheer midi dress is cut from flower-embroidered tulle. Designed for a close fit, it delicately outlines your feminine silhouette and is bound to make you feel special. Wear it for a cocktail party with a pair heels and a tonal clutch.

This mini dress is designed for the nights when you want to look your best. Made for a figure-sculpting fit, it features an alluring side slit, chain shoulder straps and long sleeves to temper the off-shoulder style. Style it with a biker jacket and slouchy boots for a bold look or cool off the drama with a classic trench and knee-high boots.

Whether you're getting ready for a black-tie event or a family gathering, you can't go wrong with this elegant A-line dress. It cinches at the waist with a tonal vegan-leather belt and has sheer, billowy sleeves that make this understated piece not only ultra trendy but also subtly chic. Style it with pumps and a simple clutch.

This gorgeous bodycon dress replete with feminine allure is your best ally when it comes to black-tie events. The sharp design features a universally flattering square neckline, ideal for showcasing your favorite necklaces. Complete the look with pointy black pumps or, depending on the occasion, tone down the drama with high-heel ankle boots.

This dress from our new collection has quite some hallmarks of elegant feminine dressing. Its bodice is cut for a flattering wrap effect while the A-line skirt flows to a midi-length hem. It has a camp collar that lends structure and an elegant touch to the overall design. The buckled belt decorated with rhinestones beautifully defines your waist while allowing you to easily adjust the fit. Style it with a pair of pumps.

Our new collection embraces the season’s shirt dress trend, lending femininity to its fundamental simplicity and making it an essential addition to your closet. This midi dress is a perfect foundation for casual looks and office wear alike. Layer it over slip dresses, turtlenecks or tees and finish your look with a pair of heels or sneakers, depending on your mood.

Made from a stretchy cotton-blend, this ribbed-knit mini dress is created with a sports-luxe aesthetic in mind. Its figure-sculpting fit makes it comfortable to wear all day long. It's perfect for building directional looks around it - you can team it with jackets, coats, belts, sneakers or wide boots - your options are infinite.

Our knack for designing effortlessly chic pieces is especially evident in this dress tailored with fitted bodice, decorative pearl buttons and blouson sleeves. Designed to make you look feminine and sophisticated, it nicely skims your silhouette while the front slit makes the hem flutter beautifully and reveals a touch of skin as you walk.

Perfect for everything from long flights to WFH, these ribbed-knit pants are designed to make you feel ultra comfortable. Cut for a relaxed fit to look luxe yet remain incredibly cozy, they have an elasticated waistband and long, wide legs. Wear them with our brand's matching turtleneck sweater.

These palazzo pants are tailored wide through the legs and finish at a floor-skimming length. Cut for a high rise, they have a shape that flatters so many body types and their design calls for styling experiments. Team them with a blouse and a pair of pumps for understated elegance in your office chic or wear them with a tank, barely-there sandals and statement earrings when going out.

Feeling like upgrading your downtime wardrobe? These straight-leg track pants are ideal for everything from WFH and chillling on the sofa to an early-morning run. They're made from a cotton-blend with a bit of stretch, so they won't restrict your movements. Team them with the coordinating sweatshirt.

Perfect for everything from long flights to WFH, these ribbed-knit pants are designed to make you feel ultra comfortable. Cut for a relaxed fit to look luxe yet remain incredibly cozy, they have an elasticated waistband and long, wide legs. Wear them with our brand's matching turtleneck sweater.

These straight-leg pants are great for working both casual outfits and boardroom looks. They nicely create flattering silhouettes and beautifully define the waist. Team them with everything from crisp shirts to camisole tops and don't forget to have the coordinating blazer with you in case it gets chilly outside.

These straight-leg pants tailored to sit high on the waist are a tried-and-tested staple. Made to flatter your frame, they'll work with everything from tees and tops to crisp shirts. They're also designed with folded cuffs - ideal for showing off your shoes, sneakers or boots.

Feeling like upgrading your downtime wardrobe? These straight-leg track pants are ideal for everything from WFH and chillling on the sofa to an early-morning run. They're made from a cotton-blend with a bit of stretch, so they won't restrict your movements. Team them with the coordinating sweatshirt.

Designed to completement both your office and weekend wardrobes, these pants are cut for a straight-leg fit. They have a high rise and include a wide, tonal double-ring belt, an unexpected element in office wear that adds an interesting touch to this style. Team this pair with our brand’s matching blouse. Finish the look with a tote on busy days.

These wide-leg pants with a slightly tampered hem have a waist-cinching pleated high-rise fit that gently elongates your silhouette. The masculine overtones of this cut lend an aura of cool to your office chic. Tailored in a neutral hue, these pants will become your long-lasting and flattering companion for important meetings. Wear yours with a coordinating blazer for elevated power suiting or try them with a pair of heels and a sheer tucked-in blouse to up your style credentials.

This mini skirt crafted from vegan leather is made to become the starting point in your after-dark ensemble. It's gathered along the sides for a body-hugging silhouette, which adds tactile allure to your look. Team it with airy blouses or chunky knits.

This mini skirt crafted from vegan leather is made to become the starting point in your after-dark ensemble. It's gathered along the sides for a body-hugging silhouette, which adds tactile allure to your look. Team it with airy blouses or chunky knits.

With a mini-length hem and the paperbag waist that shapes the feminine silhouette, this skirt gives you a shortcut to a fashion-forward style. The piece features comfortable pockets and a tonal D-ring belt. Show off the paperbag waist with tucked-in tanks or tees and add a pair chunky sneakers for an edgy finish.

Reminiscent of the '80s aesthetics, this denim mini skirt channels confidence. Crafted with an ultra-high, paper-bag-effect waist and detailed with a row of buttons, it has a casual, contemporary vibe. Team it with chunky knits or relaxed tops and high boots.

With the approach of autumn, multilayering becomes relevant: the airy silhouette of the pleated skirt will create a delicate image with a tonal shirt, jacket and high boots or will allow you to make a romantic note in the casual look with a t-shirt, leather jacket and rough boots. The belt will highlight the waist.

This skirt is the epitome of elegant sophistication. Its midi-length style is defined by dainty ties that can be tied into a bow slightly above the waist. The thigh-grazing slit makes the silhouette all the more dramatic. Show off the waist ties by wearing it with a matching cropped top for a chic evening look.

This mini skirt tailored with a wrap effect and embellished with buttons is a perfect statement piece for your office wardrobe. It's defined by its sophisticated design, architectural cuts and mini-length hem. To complete the look, you can pair it with second-skin turtlenecks, cotton shirts or blazers in neutral hues.

Smart and elegant, this skirt is designed in a slight A-line silhouette and hits about mid-thigh. It sits high on the waist and comes with a wide tonal buckle belt to define the narrowest part of your frame. This piece is cut with a layer of tonal fabric peeking out from the front slit, so the design remains office-appropriate. Style it with tucked-in blouses or skinny sweaters and classic pumps.

This skirt is the epitome of elegant sophistication. Its midi-length style is defined by dainty ties that can be tied into a bow slightly above the waist. The thigh-grazing slit makes the silhouette all the more dramatic. Show off the waist ties by wearing it with a matching cropped top for a chic evening look.
Model measurements: 173cm height, 84cm chest, 60cm waist, 90cm, wearing a size M
Model measurements: 173cm height, 84cm chest, 60cm waist, 90cm, wearing a size M

Designed to exude a classic-cool feel, this coat is made to become your autumn-capsule hero. Crafted from wool-blend, it will layer perfectly over everything from office to sporty clothing. It's endlessly versatile thanks to its calm hue and straight-line silhouette - you can easily combine it with bright statement pieces.

With the approach of the cold season, girls are wondering: how to insulate and make it beautiful? And we think that trendy fur coat from eco fur-an accurate hit on target. Laconic design without unnecessary details, delicate mint color that will make the image restrained and belt to effectively highlight the waist-you will be happy to wear it again and again. Temperature range up to -15°C.

Minimalist inspirations can be seen in so many elements of this puffer jacket - from its calm hue to concealed fastening and absence of hardware. All the focus lies in function and comfort - it's warm and endlessly versatile. It's designed to keep you warm even if the temperature dips as low as -15 С°. You can even wear it over an office suit - the notched lapels and waist-cinching belt lend this jacket just enough seriousness.

This wool-blend coat tailored in a wraparound silhouette to feel as cozy as a hug is exactly what you need when the autumn chill hits. Made for a relaxed fit, it's defined by the two-tone design. Use the self-tie belt to cinch the waist - it will nicely highlight your feminine frame and temper the loose fit.

Designed to channel understated elegance, this straight-line wool-blend coat is made with a concealed snap-button fastening to focus all attention on the waist cinched with a black buckle belt. The coat is tailored for a relaxed fit, so you can easily layer it over sweaters and blazers alike. Finish the look with chunky soles or knee-high boots or go for a more laidback look - remove the belt and complete the outfit with a pair of sneakers.

Influenced by classic elegance of our wool coats, this endlessly soft faux-fur coat is designed in a double-breasted silhouette. Thanks to its calm hue, midi-length hem and relaxed fit, this coat looks and feels incredibly comfy. The notched lapels add an elegant touch while the fur sash highlights the waist.

This incredibly light and warm wool coat is the ultimate cold-weather essential. Designed with dropped shoulders, patch pockets and notched lapels, it has a relaxed yet smart profile. The absence of lining reveals a contrasting color on the inside which moves to the lapels, creating a beautiful two-tone effect at the front.

Designed to be worn with the coordinating bermuda shorts, this double-breasted blazer is tailored with notched lapels, flap pockets and tonal covered buttons. Layer it over a button-up blouse for a structural touch in your office chic.

To take your corporate look from ordinary to outstanding, we’ve put a modern spin on a classic blazer by creating a double lapel on one side. Cut for a loose fit, this blazer has a single-breasted front and structured shoulders. The polished cut of this piece and its versatile hue make it a shortcut to boardroom chic. Simply team it with wide-leg pants and a T-shirt for an elegant yet effortless 9-to-5 look or style it up with timeless pointed pumps for an office-ready look that commands attention.

This single-breasted blazer is designed for a tailored fit. It's been crafted with notched lapels, structured shoulders and a nipped-in waist highlighted by an asymmetric button closure. The almost architectural cut is nicely tempered by the calm, gray hue. Style it with other tailored separates.

To take your corporate look from ordinary to outstanding, we’ve put a modern spin on a classic blazer by creating a double lapel on one side. Cut for a loose fit, this blazer has a single-breasted front and structured shoulders. The polished cut of this piece and its versatile hue make it a shortcut to boardroom chic. Simply team it with wide-leg pants and a T-shirt for an elegant yet effortless 9-to-5 look or style it up with timeless pointed pumps for an office-ready look that commands attention.

This single-breasted blazer is designed for a tailored fit. It's been crafted with notched lapels, structured shoulders and a nipped-in waist highlighted by an asymmetric button closure. The almost architectural cut is nicely tempered by the calm, gray hue. Style it with other tailored separates.

Inspired by timeless, classic tailoring, this single-breasted blazer made with notched lapels is the perfect foundation for your office dressing. It has a nipped-in waist that lends a light feminine touch to sharp tailoring. You can layer it over tops and shirts alike. Complete the look with the tonal pants and a pair of pumps.

Classic and comfortable, this jacket's been cut from organic cotton-denim for a slightly loose fit. It's been designed with dropped shoulders and flared, exaggerated cuffs that add a boxy, nonchalant feel. The style features a wide buckle belt that you can use to cinch the waist. This jacket really promises practical style mileage - wear it with everything from chiffon dresses to tanks with bike shorts.

Designed in an elegant double-breasted silhouette, this blazer is another exquisite example of our love for power suiting. This elegant piece has a close fit and flattering nipped-in waist enhanced by pleats and detailed with two buttons for an interesting touch. Style it with the matching pants and a pair of heels.

Classic and comfortable, this jacket's been cut from organic cotton-denim for a slightly loose fit. It's been designed with dropped shoulders and flared, exaggerated cuffs that add a boxy, nonchalant feel. The style features a wide buckle belt that you can use to cinch the waist. This jacket really promises practical style mileage - wear it with everything from chiffon dresses to tanks with bike shorts.

These stretchy briefs are ribbed to enhance your curves and cut to sit high on your waist. They're designed with high-cut hips to elongate your frame making this style all the more flattering. You can match this pair with the coordinating top for your next beach trip.

We certainly have a penchant for creating silhouettes that will make you look twice. Case in point? This coveted bikini style has an alluring cutout at the front. The top is designed with slender shoulder straps detailed with dainty gold-tone chains that will look beautiful on your sun-kissed skin. Pair it with our brand's coordinating briefs for your next perfect vacation photo.

Made from comfortable stretch fabric, these bikini briefs are cut in a simple mid-rise shape and have elongating high-cut hips. They'll work with just about any bikini top you have but we love them most with our coordinating chain-embellished style.

Made from comfortable stretch fabric, these bikini briefs are cut in a simple mid-rise shape and have elongating high-cut hips. They'll work with just about any bikini top you have but we love them most with our coordinating chain-embellished style.

We certainly have a penchant for creating silhouettes that will make you look twice. Case in point? This coveted bikini style has an alluring cutout at the front. The top is designed with slender shoulder straps detailed with dainty gold-tone chains that will look beautiful on your sun-kissed skin. Pair it with our brand's coordinating briefs for your next perfect vacation photo.

Ribbed styles are a hit this summer because they so beautifully flatter your shape. Tapping into this trend and cut from comfortably stretchy ribbed fabric, this bikini top has supportive wide shoulder straps and a square neckline. Wear it with the matching briefs on your next sun-drenched summer getaway.

If your style leans towards refined and pared-back designs, this one-piece wonder might become your new summer BFF. The classic retro square neckline and spaghetti straps make this swimsuit ultra flattering. Crafted from stretch fabric, it has a belt to highlight the narrowest part of your frame. Pair it with a straw hat and retro sunglasses to lounge poolside.

If your style leans towards refined and pared-back designs, this one-piece wonder might become your new summer BFF. The classic retro square neckline and spaghetti straps make this swimsuit ultra flattering. Crafted from stretch fabric, it has a belt to highlight the narrowest part of your frame. Pair it with a straw hat and retro sunglasses to lounge poolside.

If your style leans towards refined and pared-back designs, this one-piece wonder might become your new summer BFF. The classic retro square neckline and spaghetti straps make this swimsuit ultra flattering. Crafted from stretch fabric, it has a belt to highlight the narrowest part of your frame. Pair it with a straw hat and retro sunglasses to lounge poolside.

By designing these bermuda shorts from vegan leather we transported the fashion set's favorite silhouette of the latest summer to autumn. Made in a versatile black hue, the shorts are tailored for a relaxed fit with a high-rise waist beautifully cinched with a tonal buckle belt. Make them the center of your outfit and team them with tonal tights, knee-high boots and a second-skin sweater.

This pair of tailored shorts is the key for looking sharp this season. Intended to be styled with the matching blazer, these bermuda shorts are cut for a relaxed fit with pleats at the front and a high rise for extra comfort. The tonal buckle belt nicely highlights the waist. The shorts hit just above the knee so you can easily add them to your office-appropriate closet. Our styling tip is to pair them with high heels.

One of the most sought-after shapes of severalbseasons by now, Bermuda shorts have earned a place in our autumn collection with ease. Tailored in a black hue to hit just right above the knee, they’re made for a wide-leg fit. Style them with tucked-in shirts or knitted sweaters.

One of the most sought-after shapes of severalbseasons by now, Bermuda shorts have earned a place in our autumn collection with ease. Tailored in a black hue to hit just right above the knee, they’re made for a wide-leg fit. Style them with tucked-in shirts or knitted sweaters.

Cut from a soft cotton-blend, these track-inspired shorts have rolled cuffs that hit just above the knees. The high-rise, elasticated waist makes them an ultra-comfortable option for summer styling. Wear them on relaxed weekends with knitted tanks, tees or the matching sweatshirt and a pair of slides.

Looking for an easy and effortless piece for laidback days? Try these ultra-comfortable track shorts. Cut from a soft cotton-blend, they are designed for a comfortable straight-leg fit. They have a sporty elasticated waist and hit just above the knee. The style is finished with a print that reads “minimalism” to sum up the simplistic design. Pair them with a matching tee for a lazy weekend.

Looking for an easy and effortless piece for laidback days? Try these ultra-comfortable track shorts. Cut from a soft cotton-blend, they are designed for a comfortable straight-leg fit. They have a sporty elasticated waist and hit just above the knee. The style is finished with a print that reads “minimalism” to sum up the simplistic design. Pair them with a matching tee for a lazy weekend.

They have a sporty elasticated waist and hit just above the knee. The style is finished with a print that reads “minimalism” to sum up the simplistic design. Pair them with a matching tee for a lazy weekend.

They have a sporty elasticated waist and hit just above the knee. The style is finished with a print that reads “minimalism” to sum up the simplistic design. Pair them with a matching tee for a lazy weekend.

A contemporary, luxe twist on a classic turtleneck, this sweater is crafted for a loose fit with extra long, wide sleeves and dropped shoulders to exaggerate the oversized silhouette even more. Artfully designed with an asymmetric hem, it has ribbed cuffs and collar. This piece is endlessly comfortable and soft and will pair well with almost anything. Our stylists, however, prefer it with the matching wide-leg pants.

The comfort and versatility of this relaxed sweatshirt cannot be overstated. Made with a classic crew-neckline, dropped shoulders and elastic cuffs, it couldn't be more comfy. Pair it with the matching pants or your go-to jeans.

A contemporary, luxe twist on a classic turtleneck, this sweater is crafted for a loose fit with extra long, wide sleeves and dropped shoulders to exaggerate the oversized silhouette even more. Artfully designed with an asymmetric hem, it has ribbed cuffs and collar. This piece is endlessly comfortable and soft and will pair well with almost anything. Our stylists, however, prefer it with the matching wide-leg pants.

This understated top has the key texture for autumn styling - a ribbed knit. It's second-skin fit makes this piece ideal for layering under overshirts, blazers and cardigans. The top works great solo but we love it most under the matching crop top.

The comfort and versatility of this relaxed sweatshirt cannot be overstated. Made with a classic crew-neckline, dropped shoulders and elastic cuffs, it couldn't be more comfy. Pair it with the matching pants or your go-to jeans.

This soft knitted cardigan is such a nice and comfy option for the cold season. It’s designed with dropped shoulders, a V-neckline and two large patch pockets. The oversized fit of this cardigan makes it perfect for layering. Team it with the matching cropped top and jeans for a cozy and stylish autumn ensemble.

This understated top has the key texture for autumn styling - a ribbed knit. It's second-skin fit makes this piece ideal for layering under overshirts, blazers and cardigans. The top works great solo but we love it most under the matching crop top.

Refresh your knitwear collection with this crew-neck sweater. It’s made in an oversized silhouette with dropped shoulders and lengthy sleeves to look and feel extra cozy. Designed from a cotton-blend to keep its shape while ensuring you’re warm, it’s ribbed along the hem and the neckline for textural contrast. Pair it with the matching pants for a comfy monochrome look.

This soft knitted cardigan is such a nice and comfy option for the cold season. It’s designed with dropped shoulders, a V-neckline and two large patch pockets. The oversized fit of this cardigan makes it perfect for layering. Team it with the matching cropped top and jeans for a cozy and stylish autumn ensemble.

Designed with a square-toe profile and set on high block heels, this pair comes in versatile shades to ensure you can style it with everything in your summer capsule. The ideal pair to showcase your summer pedicure, they are made with tubular straps elegantly arching over your feet. Wear them with mini styles and generous hems alike.

These not only practical but also ultra-trendy sandals are just as suited to sunny vacations as they are to city breaks. Made from vegan leather and set on a platform sole, they perfectly secure your feet. The pair is comfortable enough to wear for hours on end. Team them with everything from denim to chiffon dresses.

These sandals are crafted from vegan leather with wide straps and set on a block heel providing 6,5 cm of height. The pair is comfortable enough for all-day wear. The ivory hue is super versatile and will complement every shade. Style them with everything from skinny jeans to floaty dresses.

These not only practical but also ultra-trendy sandals are just as suited to sunny vacations as they are to city breaks. Made from vegan leather and set on a platform sole, they perfectly secure your feet. The pair is comfortable enough to wear for hours on end. Team them with everything from denim to chiffon dresses.

Designed with a square-toe profile and set on high block heels, this pair comes in versatile shades to ensure you can style it with everything in your summer capsule. The ideal pair to showcase your summer pedicure, they are made with tubular straps elegantly arching over your feet. Wear them with mini styles and generous hems alike.

These sandals are crafted from vegan leather with wide straps and set on a block heel providing 6,5 cm of height. The pair is comfortable enough for all-day wear. Their nude hue is super versatile and will complement every shade. Style them with everything from skinny jeans to floaty dresses.

These high-heeled sandals combine a versatile shade and a wide strap with an accent buckle, which will add to the image of originality, becoming its expressive detail.This pair will stylishly complete the look with any dress or skirt, as well as with jeans and trousers of 7/8 length.

These high-heeled sandals combine a versatile shade and a wide strap with an accent buckle, which will add to the image of originality, becoming its expressive detail.This pair will stylishly complete the look with any dress or skirt, as well as with jeans and trousers of 7/8 length.

Delicate lace-up sandals are complemented by an original geometric heel, which will add a bright accent to the image. The heel is stable and provides comfort when walking all day long.Wear this pair as an addition to a romantic dress or to a set with shorts.
